name: Tammuz Blood & Sand
summary:
Do you think you can Outsmart a God?

This seated Puzzle Box Experience will test your will and wit. Told through the eyes of a prisoned deity. Step into the unknown with a ground-breaking XR experience.

Immerse yourself in a world where ancient gods clash, and their secrets are locked away in mind-bending puzzles. As the boundary between reality and myth blurs, you’ll face divine trials, outwit an eternal guardian, and uncover a story of power, sacrifice, and destiny. In this fully interactive...
